Done.  I also updated the calls to lseek() to use the officially 
blessed macros.  If these aren't defined for some reason under Windows, 
we should add the following lines to platform.h:


#ifndef SEEK_SET
#define SEEK_SET	0
#define SEEK_CUR	1
#define SEEK_END	2
#endif


-Greg
